special_moves.name: Spin Slash
special_moves.description: A spinning blade attack that hits all nearby enemies with moderate knockback.

special_moves.name: Power Thrust
special_moves.description: A powerful forward thrust that ignores partial armor and pierces through defenses.

special_moves.name: Rising Slash
special_moves.description: An upward slash that launches enemies into the air with high critical hit chance.

special_moves.name: Overhead Smash
special_moves.description: A devastating overhead attack that stuns enemies and creates a ground shockwave.

special_moves.name: Whirlwind
special_moves.description: Spin continuously with your axe extended, hitting all nearby enemies multiple times.

special_moves.name: Cleave
special_moves.description: A wide horizontal cleave that causes bleeding and hits multiple targets.

special_moves.name: Impale
special_moves.description: Pin an enemy in place with a powerful thrust that causes severe bleeding.

special_moves.name: Javelin Toss
special_moves.description: Throw your spear as a javelin, piercing through multiple enemies in a line.

special_moves.name: Sweeping Strike
special_moves.description: A sweeping attack that trips enemies in a wide arc around you.

special_moves.name: Multi Shot
special_moves.description: Fire multiple arrows simultaneously in a spread pattern.

special_moves.name: Piercing Arrow
special_moves.description: A powerful arrow that pierces through armor and multiple enemies.

special_moves.name: Rain of Arrows
special_moves.description: Fire arrows into the sky that rain down on a large area after a brief delay.

special_moves.name: Fireball
special_moves.description: Hurl a blazing fireball that explodes on impact, dealing fire damage.

special_moves.name: Ice Lance
special_moves.description: Conjure a spear of ice that pierces enemies and slows their movement.

special_moves.name: Lightning Strike
special_moves.description: Call down a lightning bolt that chains to nearby enemies and stuns them.

special_moves.name: Arcane Blast
special_moves.description: Release a massive blast of arcane energy that knocks back all nearby enemies.

special_moves.name: Combo Finisher
special_moves.description: A powerful finisher move available to all weapon types. Deals more damage after dodge cancels.

special_moves.name: Perfect Counter
special_moves.description: Block and immediately counter attack. Requires precise timing but deals massive damage.
